nvidia-docker run \
--name textise_vendor_debug \
--network=host \
-v /data/yn/dzjz/:/juanzong \
-v /data/dockerdata/ocr:/data \
-e INSTANT_ID=textise_vendor_node_debug \
-e KAFKA_SERVER=192.168.2.31 \
-e DB=postgresql://postgres:postgres@192.168.2.31:5432/cv \
-e OSS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=xxx \
-e OSS_ACCESS_KEY_SECRET=xxx \
-e OSS_BUCKET=xxx \
-e OSS_ENDPOINT=xxx\
-it textise_vendor:3.0.0 \
bash
